channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Road surface broken and uneven outside number 42 and 44, 27th June
item.description:
The road surface is very uneven and broken outside number 42 to 44. It has been patched up with tarmac various times and done badly, the whole area needs to be resurfaced properly as more and more cracks are appearing and the road has dipped here. The whole road actually needs resurfacing as it is very uneven
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ashbourne Avenue, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overhanging trees/shrubs force pedestrians into road, 27th June
item.description:
I have been walking this path for several months and the overgrowing trees/shrubs force pedestrians into the road and is dangerous. This path is between Twixus Child Care and Orpington Golf Club on Sandy Lane.. What3words location: ///powder.boxing.spicy ///paid.ears.begins ///hype.factories.paid. ///gosh.surely.scales

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sandy Lane, St Paul's Cray, London

item.title: Bushes planted on footway overgrown and blocking pedestrians, 27th June
item.description:

item.title: Temporary crossing/traffic lights out of sync, 27th June
item.description:
This morning when I was crossing the road pictured (from the corner of Shoreditch Park in the direction indicated in the photo) the crossing man turned green at the same time as the traffic light went green. A lady and her dog had to jump back on to the footpath out of the way of oncoming traffic. Can this please be fixed before someone gets hurt! Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eagle Wharf Road, Hoxton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned car, 27th June
item.description:
Hi, tenant evicted and left car here in private parking bay. He has been contacted and said he will move the car. 6 weeks ago no movement. It’s sorn and doesn’t go. I put notice on vehicle which has expired by some weeks. Needs to go as it’s a parking space allocated to a flat in the block. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Devonshire Road, Blendon, London
